AJ Dezines presents this black coloured party wear boys dress set. Fashion style with super fine silk blend fabric and crafted with brooch and fancy button work that feel your boy all day comfortable. This kids clothes set comprises of a full sleeve kurta, a waistcoat and pair of pyjama. Featuring nehru collar, button detailing, solid pattern, pocket square, curved hem, eye catching design and these kids cloths are light in weight and presented to patrons in different sizes. You can club it with a pair of mojari for perfect traditional look. Suitable for party, wedding, ceremony, any occasion festival like Diwali, Navratri, Dussehra, Pongal, Onam, Lohri, Eid, Christmas and so on. Surprise your little boy with this trending pink colored side button kurta pyjama set from AJ Dezines. Will add more stars to your child?s personality and will give him a complete ethnic look. Kurta has round collar and full sleeve with roll-up tab feature, single placket with asymmetric hem, printed pattern and pyjamas has elastic which ensures it fits to the little and delicate waist of your child. You can team it up with matching footwear and accessories for a complete ethnic look. This boys ethnic suit suitable for parties, wedding, ceremony, festival like like Diwali, Navratri, Dussehra, Pongal, Onam, Lohri, Eid, Christmas and so on. body:
Aggrandize your prince's personality by dressing him in this orange designer party wear 3- piece indo western set from AJ Dezines. Made from 100% cotton fabric. In this kids cloths set comprises sober Kurta, modi jacket and Polo Pant. Jacket features has printed, embroidered(dabka, catdana, gems, thread and zardosi) work, fancy button, banded collar. The fit is regular for boys clothing. The ethnic wear set will contribute to an absolute traditional look and will make your son look adorable. Team it up with a pair of mojaris to get the perfect traditional look. We are specialist in kids wear for boys. Our goal is to bring you children close to indian culture. Here you can find a wide range kids clothing for boys in kids ethnic wear which includes sherwani, indo western, kurta pyjama, pathani, tuxedo, dhoti kurta, angrakha set and lot more.
Cotton Hand-wash

body:
Special Technique/Craft: Kalamkari is a type of hand-painted or block-printed cotton textile, wherein motifs are inspired from the folklore and are hand painted using the tool of kalam directly onto the fabric. The process involves washing, rinsing, soaking and bleaching the fabric and applying mordants and dyes using natural substances like indigo (blue), madder (red), mango bark (yellow) and palm sugar (black). Painting on the fabric is done with a kalam, charcoal and myrobalan paste.  Design:Region: Andhra Pradesh and Madhya PradeshCoffee brown and greenHand block print A-line maxi skirtHas a partially elasticated waistbandSide slitKalamkari hand block printDisclaimer:This is a handcrafted skirt, and is prone to colour bleeding due to use of natural dyesThe print on the garment might be uneven- owing to the handcrafted nature of the product, adding essence to the garment.
The model (height 5'8'') is wearing a size 26
100% cotton Hand-Wash Cold, Wash Dark Colors Separately

body:
Showcasing bold scallop tile print all over and a flared cut, this olive coloured Anarkali kurta from Sangria is all about modern styles fusing with traditional style. Made from cotton, this kurta has an angrakha design, 3/4th sleeves and a round neck, this kurta is highly stylish as well as elegant. This kurta can be styled with a pair of beige sandals and a white churidar to look your best.	Bold scallop tile print all over	Flared cut	Empire waistline	Angrakha design
